subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Spiraling out of control- Enough of the namecalling and fighting!!
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
--_a8e9f782-28cb-459a-93fa-0da71e598f3b_
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable


 Yeah, I am the master! But... that's only when the Ol' Lady ain't looking=
 over my shoulder! I have to tell everyone--she's pissed!!!! Way too much t=
ime in the basement, and way to much money spent on something she considers=
 useless.  I'm rushing on yet another proto type, one that gets rid of rand=
om mode, and has all functions, linear, with direct voice mode, or though a=
 sound chamber. Then---it's time to play with tones. 
 
 Random mode, depsi=
te the professed theory out there, no longer works for me, maybe it's psych=
ological, but the damn circuits won't even function. Random in the #24 box =
would not work at all at the Stanley, so I' am abandoning that function. I =
know what Moon claims about the raw having to be random--simply not true, t=
hat was based on my assumptions about how the box worked in the early days =
of boxology. 
 
 Frank-S


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: bulletbabea@yah=
oo.comDate: Sun, 2 Dec 2007 18:26:41 -0800Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Spiraling =
out of control- Enough of the namecalling and fighting!!





To ALL member=
s of this group,
I agree with Steve. Ive told you all this many times yet s=
ome of you like to get caught up in the heat of the moment.
 
It is very di=
sturbing to watch you all try to win this war of words. There is no winner =
just a bunch of losers. And while you are busy losing theres no GOOD resear=
ch being performed by YOU.
 
How much research did YOU do today? How much t=
ime did you spend firing off replies to attempt to respond to someone you d=
ont even know about something that doesnt even involve YOU? How much time d=
id you spend replying to join in the arguments you feel do involve YOU?
 
T=
he point being, this is a research group for ITC not a boxing room and defi=
nitely your own personal battlegrounds. Take that elsewhere. Healthy discus=
sion is one thing but I have seen very few people offering that. In fact I =
know a few of you joined here just to go after someone who ticked you off. =
Then there are those who just seem to be firing in all directions, taget do=
esnt matter.
 
Get a grip people!! Ive seen 4 year olds with more self cont=
rol. If you arent interested in researching ITC for yourself then what the =
heck are YOU doing HERE. 
 
ONCE AGAIN THIS IS AN ITC RESEARCH GROUP!! 
 
A=
s for the box Frank is and always has been the first/primary tester of any =
box he has built. 
 
lol
Misty
 
P.S. I think you all are capable of findin=
g better things to do, if not let me know and I will give you a few ideas =
=3D)
Steve Hultay <urkel23@...> wrote:


I think we should all focus at=
 the research at hand and forget what everyone else is doing. I personally =
know Chris and think he's a great guy and frank feels the same way most day=
s. This has gotten to the point where i can't even do a session anymore bec=
ause i'm so blocked by negative thoughts from this group it's pointless to =
concentrate on the box and get results. Honestly who cares what chris does =
anyway, does it really affect everyone's lives that much. I have a job and =
this is a hobby that i used to really like, but now this board has brought =
me down. It seems all people want to do is make this like a street fight wi=
th challenges and negative views and for what reason? If anyone is concerne=
d about hearing Chris's audio, i have about 2 hours of box sessions from Ea=
stern State on my web site for all to listen to. It's www.keyportparanormal=
.com and go to investigation and click on eastern state. All the audio is a=
t the bottom of that page and you guys can judge for yourself and i heard a=
 lot come out of that box that night personally because i repeated a lot of=
 stuff back to chris that i heard. Enough already, let's move on to the nex=
t great thing. That radio shack hack was a great breakthrough here, let's j=
ust be happy we got that before it was shut down. Now we have another avenu=
e to go down, but we can't do it with all these negatives out there. Let's =
move on to new topics and anyone out there that bought a Radio Shack box, s=
tart sharing your files with the group so it's not just us same 5 that post=
 all the time.-Steve H.


Be a better sports nut! Let your teams follow you=
 with Yahoo Mobile. Try it now.
